Bear Fang Defense.name: Bear Fang Defense
Bear Fang Defense.flavor: Your spirit companion lets out the terrible roar of the Great Bear and smashes its heavy paw into your foe. The presence of the bear spirit is impossible to ignore.
Bear Fang Defense.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn. Until the mark ends, whenever the target makes an attack while adjacent to your spirit companion, the target takes 1d10 damage and is knocked prone after the attack is resolved.

Galvanizing Bellow.name: Galvanizing Bellow
Galvanizing Bellow.flavor: The roar of your spirit companion spurs your allies to move.
Galvanizing Bellow.effect: Each target can shift 2 squares as a free action.

Call to the Great Bear.name: Call to the Great Bear
Call to the Great Bear.flavor: Your spirit companion mauls your enemy with its claws and teeth. The spirit of the Great Bear lingers around your foe, punishing it for harming your allies.
Call to the Great Bear.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls, and whenever it hits with an attack, the target takes 1d10 + your Wisdom modifier damage (save ends both).
